General.Name: Nanjing Port Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Port Co., Ltd. provides port-related services in China. It offers crude, refined oil, and liquid chemicals transit and storage; bonded storage of petrochemical products; and integrated logistics services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China. Nanjing Port Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Nanjing Port (Group) Co., Ltd.
